questions.question: evidence
questions.hint: facts, information, documents, etc. that give reason to believe that something is true

questions.question: diary
questions.hint: a book in which you record your thoughts or feelings or what has happened each day

questions.question: goof
questions.hint: a silly mistake

questions.question: plot
questions.hint: the story of a book, film, play, etc.

questions.question: guest
questions.hint: a person who is staying with you, or a person you have invited to a social occasion, such as a party or a meal

questions.question: resort
questions.hint: a place where many people go for rest, sport, or another stated purpose

questions.question: picnic
questions.hint: an occasion when you have an informal meal of sandwiches, etc. outside, or the food itself

questions.question: shortcut
questions.hint: a route that leads from one place to another and is quicker and more direct than the usual route

questions.question: rookie
questions.hint: (informal) a person who is new to an organization or an activity

questions.question: prediction
questions.hint: a statement about what you think will happen in the future

questions.question: destination
questions.hint: the place where someone is going or where something is being sent or taken

questions.question: expenses
questions.hint: money that you spend when you are doing your job, that your employer will pay back to you

questions.question: journey
questions.hint: the act of travelling from one place to another, especially in a vehicle

questions.question: hideout
questions.hint: a secret place where someone can go when they do not want to be found by other people

questions.question: lifeguard
questions.hint: a person on a beach or at a swimming pool whose job is to make certain that the swimmers are safe and save them if they are in danger

questions.question: encryption
questions.hint: the process of changing electronic information or signals into a secret code that people cannot understand or use without special equipment

questions.question: content
questions.hint: information, images, video, etc. that are included as part of something such as a website

questions.question: square
questions.hint: a flat shape with four sides of equal length and four angles of 90Â°

questions.question: wealth
questions.hint: a large amount of money or valuable possessions that someone has

questions.question: herder
questions.hint: a person who takes care of a large group of animals of the same type

questions.question: ancestor
questions.hint: a person related to you who lived a long time ago

questions.question: neighborhood
questions.hint: the area of a town that surrounds someone's home, or the people who live in this area

questions.question: algorithm
questions.hint: a set of mathematical instructions or rules that, especially if given to a computer, will help to calculate an answer to a problem

questions.question: gift
questions.hint: a present or something that is given

questions.question: author
questions.hint: the writer of a book, article, play, etc.

questions.question: hometown
questions.hint: the town or city that a person is from, especially the one in which they were born and lived while they were young

questions.question: weekend
questions.hint: Saturday and Sunday, or Friday evening until Sunday night; the part of the week in which many people living in the West do not go to work

questions.question: software
questions.hint: the instructions that control what a computer does; computer programs

questions.question: server
questions.hint: a central computer from which other computers get information

questions.question: debug
questions.hint: to remove bugs (mistakes) from a computer program
